info.title: Peexoo's API swagger documentation
info.description: This is a sample Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).

put.summary: adds a new album to booking

post.summary: Allows a user to report a photographer for a booking

put.summary: Downloads the album to the user's FindMyFace Album Collection

post.summary: Searches for the face of a user

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of random images to fetch

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of random images to fetch

post.summary: Creates a new Payment for a user
Adds the User details to the Peexoo Photographer Community
Add an Authenticated User to the list of Photographers

get.summary: Gets the Photographer Object for an authenticated User
Gets the Photographer Object using photographer Id

post.summary: Adds a new BankDetail for a Photographer

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the profile image. ie PROFILE_COVER_IMAGES or HOMEPAGE_SLIDER_IMAGES

post.summary: Adds an image's url to the list of a Photographer's profile Images in a category

get.summary: Generates Payment for an authenticated user to a Subscription Object

parameters.name: subscription_plan_id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription to join

post.summary: This endpoint has to be hit by the payment gateway, but we'll make it open for testing purposes.
Searches for an authenticated user's subscriptions

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email for the verification sent to the user

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: The verification code sent to the user

parameters.name: url_path
parameters.description: The Url to the page that would conclude the reset. The final url would be {url_path}/token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of the user requesting for email reset

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the User to ban

patch.summary: Updates an Authenticated User. It can only update the name and profile image

get.summary: Get a User's data by user Id. Prameter

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the User to ban

get.description: A sample Peexoo greeting to test out the API

user_id.title: The Id of the user for this booking

photographer_id.title: Photographer's Id
photographer_id.description: The Id of the photographer for this booking.

booking_category_id.title: Booking Category Id
booking_category_id.description: The Id of the category that the booking belongs to

title.title: Title
title.description: The title for this booking. This is optional

extra_message.title: Extra message
extra_message.description: Additional Text provided by the user

country.title: Country
country.description: The country for the booking's shoot

state.title: State
state.description: The state in the country for the booking's shoot

type.title: Type
type.description: The Type of Booking. This is optional

shoot_start_date.title: Start Date
shoot_start_date.description: The start date of the shoot for this booking

shoot_end_date.title: End Date
shoot_end_date.description: The end date of the shoot for this booking

delivery_date.title: Delivery date
delivery_date.description: The Date for delivery of the booking's shoot. Defaults to shoot end date if not set.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status os the booking. This is set by the backend

profile_image.title: Profile Picture
profile_image.description: User Profile Picture. This is a url to the image.

job_description.title: Job Description
job_description.description: The person's Job Description in a word!!

tags.name: greeting
tags.description: Sample package to test out the greeting APIs
